name: Dimensional Button
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING - There is a lot of flicking between black and white, so be wary!

You find yourself in a possesion of a Dimensional Button. Once you click the button, you get a cash, but it transports you into another dimension. Get them moneys, buy upgrades, get cash over time, but only in the dimension you currently reside in!

This was made for the 1-Bit Clicker Jam over the course of some 6 days, since I had deadlines during the jam. Making this game I also learnt how to do proper game saves using XML, which is also nice.
